note:
ζητητικός. Computational math/stats, psych, social sci and (sometimes) neuro guy at a large Midwest (US) university.

Research scientist and science communications/education proponent. Interested in why people believe weird things and why conspiracy theories propagate so easily. (Also in the stuff listed at the top, obviously.)

Often satire, intentionally or not.

I like weird stuff and weird ideas, but I *don't* believe what you believe. Mostly.
